I am a frequent visitor to the beach, typically attending nearly twice a week, and I am writing to express my sincere appreciation for the work of your Security Team. In my experience, they consistently perform their duties in a professional and commendable manner.

However, I have growing concerns regarding their ability to enforce beach rules effectively, particularly during evening hours. I have witnessed numerous incidents where visitors violate regulations by consuming alcohol, harassing others, and swimming after sunset.

Most troublingly, I have seen security personnel subjected to significant disrespect and intimidation when they attempt to address these violations politely. In one recent incident, a visitor who was repeatedly asked to exit the water after sunset responded by publicly threatening a guard, stating he would ensure the guard lost his job.

When I later asked the guard why more assertive action wasn't taken, he explained that he felt unsupported by management. His belief was that should a visitor file a complaint, management would side with the visitor rather than with staff who are following protocol. This perception appears to be eroding their confidence and compromising their authority.

While I understand the importance of customer satisfaction, it is critical that staff feel empowered and supported when professionally executing their duties. The current situation not only undermines their safety and morale but also jeopardizes the safety of all visitors.

I urge you to review the protocols for supporting staff in these challenging situations. Measures such as clearer public signage, updated de-escalation training, and a demonstrated management policy of backing staff when they correctly enforce rules could significantly boost their confidence and effectiveness.

Thank you for your time and attention to this important matter. I am confident that addressing these concerns will create a safer and more enjoyable environment for both visitors and your valuable staff.

Sincerely,

A Concerned Regular Visitor

places.name: Kite Beach

reviews.text:
Kite Beach in Dubai is a vibrant coastal destination that seamlessly blends relaxation with recreation, making it a favorite among both locals and tourists. Here's an in-depth look at what makes this beach a must-visit spot:

⸻

🏖️ Beach Atmosphere & Scenery

Located in the Jumeirah neighborhood, Kite Beach boasts a wide expanse of soft white sand and crystal-clear aquamarine waters. The beach offers stunning views of the iconic Burj Al Arab, providing a picturesque backdrop for sunbathers and photographers alike. Its clean and well-maintained environment ensures a pleasant experience for all visitors.

⸻

🌊 Activities & Attractions

Kite Beach is renowned for its array of activities catering to various interests: ￼
•	Water Sports: As the name suggests, kite surfing is a popular activity here, thanks to favorable wind conditions. Additionally, visitors can engage in paddleboarding, kayaking, and other water sports.
•	Fitness & Recreation: The beach features a dedicated jogging track, outdoor gym equipment, and volleyball courts, promoting an active lifestyle.
•	Family-Friendly Zones: Children can enjoy well-equipped play areas, ensuring fun for the entire family.
•	Skate Park: For skateboarding enthusiasts, there's a skate park that adds to the beach's dynamic vibe.

⸻

🍽️ Dining Options

A variety of food trucks and cafes line the beach, offering everything from quick snacks to hearty meals. Notable spots include Salt, known for its gourmet burgers, and Taqado Mexican Kitchen, offering flavorful Mexican dishes. These eateries provide convenient and delicious options for beachgoers. ￼

⸻

🛍️ Amenities & Services

Kite Beach is equipped with essential facilities to enhance visitor comfort:
•	Restrooms & Showers: Clean and accessible facilities are available for public use.
•	Sunbed & Umbrella Rentals: Visitors can rent sunbeds and umbrellas to relax comfortably by the sea. ￼
•	Free Wi-Fi: Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi access throughout the beach area. ￼
•	Beach Library: For those who enjoy reading, there's a beach library offering a selection of books.

⸻

🚗 Accessibility & Parking

Kite Beach is easily accessible by car, taxi, or public transportation. Ample parking is available nearby, though it can get crowded during peak hours, so arriving early is advisable.

⸻

🕒 Best Time to Visit

The ideal time to visit Kite Beach is during the cooler months, from November to April, when temperatures are pleasant for outdoor activities. Early mornings and late afternoons are particularly enjoyable, offering a more relaxed atmosphere and stunning sunrise or sunset views.

⸻

⭐ Visitor Reviews

Visitors often praise Kite Beach for its cleanliness, vibrant atmosphere, and diverse range of activities. Many highlight the beach's suitability for families, fitness enthusiasts, and food lovers alike. The combination of natural beauty and well-maintained facilities contributes to its reputation as one of Dubai's top beach destinations.

⸻

📍 Final Thoughts

Whether you're seeking adventure, relaxation, or a family-friendly outing, Kite Beach offers a comprehensive beach experience that caters to all preferences. Its blend of scenic beauty, recreational activities, and convenient amenities make it a standout destination in Dubai's coastal landscape.

A beach is a beach what can I say about it .just that it was amazing as it was enjoyable to do little activities with the family and enjoy plenty of swimming in the sea and jet skiing and also relaxing .the water was warm and perfect. We had little snacks from the snack shop around the area and also there were plenty of shops to eat and do a little souvenir shopping .surrounded by two big mosques so that you don't forget to pray at  while your enjoying the weather and atmosphere .

Kite Beach is one of the best destinations in Dubai if you're looking for a perfect mix of relaxation, adventure, and stunning views. I recently visited, and it was an amazing experience from start to finish. The beach is very clean, well maintained, and has a lively yet peaceful vibe. Whether you're into kitesurfing, paddleboarding, jogging, or just soaking up the sun, there's something here for everyone.

The walking and running track along the beach is excellent for fitness enthusiasts, and there are plenty of food trucks and cafés nearby offering everything from healthy snacks to delicious treats. I tried a smoothie from one of the food stalls, and it was refreshing and perfect for the sunny weather.

The view of the Burj Al Arab from Kite Beach is simply stunning it's the perfect backdrop for photos, especially during sunset. There are also plenty of seating areas, showers, and changing facilities, which make it super convenient for families and solo travelers alike.

What I appreciated most was the relaxed, welcoming atmosphere. You see families, tourists, and locals all enjoying the space together. Parking can get a little busy, especially during weekends, but it's worth it for the experience.

Overall, Kite Beach is a must-visit spot in Dubai if you love beaches, outdoor activities, and breathtaking views. I can't wait to visit again!😍😍😍😍😍

reviews.text: Nice beach in Dubai.  Many restaurants for walking. Washrooms and changing rooms are available.  It is easily accessible through tram. The beach offers a good overall experience. The water is warm, although it can sometimes be a bit rough. It's worth noting that the water isn't as clear blue as often advertised. While the setting is pleasant, there's room for improvement with more shops, food options, and activities to enhance the overall vibe. Still, it's an enjoyable spot for a relaxing day by the sea.

Visiting Jumeirah Beach was an unforgettable experience! It's one of Dubai's most iconic public beaches, offering beautiful views, soft white sand, and crystal clear waters. From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by how clean and well-organized everything was. The beach is wide and spacious, allowing everyone to enjoy without feeling overcrowded, even on weekends.

The facilities here are excellent there are plenty of showers, changing rooms, and clean restrooms. Lifeguards are always present, making it a very safe place for families with children. There's also a long jogging and walking track along the beach, which is great for anyone who wants to stay active while enjoying the ocean breeze.

The view of the Burj Al Arab in the background adds a luxurious touch to the entire experience. It's a perfect spot for photography, especially around sunset when the colors in the sky are absolutely breathtaking.

There are many cafés and food stalls nearby, offering refreshing juices, snacks, and meals. I grabbed a coffee from a beachside café and simply relaxed while listening to the sound of the waves it was the perfect break from the busy city life.

Parking is available but can be a bit crowded during peak times, so arriving early is a good idea. There are also options for renting sun loungers and umbrellas if you plan to stay for a few hours.

Overall, Jumeirah Beach offers the perfect mix of relaxation, fun, and natural beauty. Whether you want to swim, exercise, picnic, or just unwind, this beach has something for everyone. Definitely a must-visit when you're in Dubai!

places.name: Marina Beach

reviews.text:
Dubai Marina Beach, also known as JBR Beach, is a popular public beach located along the Persian Gulf in Dubai's Marina district. It offers a vibrant atmosphere with a mix of relaxation and recreational activities. The beach provides picturesque views of the Arabian Gulf and is surrounded by the impressive skyline of Dubai Marina. Visitors have access to facilities such as free changing rooms, paid showers, and sunbeds. There are also numerous cafes and restaurants nearby, offering a variety of dining options .  The beach is suitable for swimming and sunbathing. While some areas may have rocks or sharp objects on the seabed, the water is generally clean and warm.  Many visitors appreciate the cleanliness and safety of the beach.

The beach can get crowded, especially during peak hours, but there is ample space for everyone to enjoy. Bring your own towels and beach mats if you prefer not to rent sunbeds. Visit during weekdays or early mornings to avoid crowds. Explore the nearby JBR Walk for shopping and additional dining options.

Overall, Dubai Marina Beach offers a pleasant seaside experience with the convenience of urban amenities nearby.

Unforgettable experience at Dubai Marina 😍! The boat tour was simply magical 🚤✨. Stunning views of the skyline, peaceful and luxurious vibe 🌆💎. The crew was super friendly and professional 😊. Sunset was breathtaking 🌅💖. Highly recommend this activity to relax and explore Dubai from the water 😍⛵. Pure joy 🥰🙏.

Great spot for a beach day with family, but it can get really hot, so make sure to wear a cap and bring water-especially if you're coming with kids. From the Marina Walk entrance, there's a free kids' play area, which was a pleasant surprise!

There's no free parking nearby, but paid parking is available. Just expect a bit of a walk from your parking spot to the beach. The area is clean, and the views are stunning, especially in the evening.

Highly recommend visiting early morning or around sunset for a more comfortable experience.

places.generalDescription: Beach by FIVE at the Five Palm Jumeirah Hotel in Dubai offers a luxurious beach experience with a 150-meter beachfront, double-width sun loungers, and cabanas. The Mediterranean-inspired menu features sharing-style dishes from Spain, Greece, Turkey, and the Levant. The beach club also boasts an Instagrammable glass-lined pool with a chandelier. It's known for its vibrant atmosphere, lively soundtracks, and expansive dining deck.

sources.snippet: Ready those ‘phones: this party beach club has serious Insta potential (we’re talking a glass-sided pool and a chandelier to start). The 150-metre stretch of beach is pretty alluring too, with loungers, deluxe sun beds, cabanas and even Jacuzzies. There’s also a range of signature drinks to sip while you soak up the sun and a menu made up of Mediterranean-style bites.Dhs100, Mon-Wed, Dhs200, Thurs-Sun, (ladies, includes a regular sunbed, fully redeemable)Dhs200, Mon-Wed, Dhs300, Thurs-Sun (gents, includes a regular sunbed, fully redeemable)FIVE Palm Jumeirah, Palm Jumeirah, fivehotelsandresorts.com (04 455 9989).

reviews.text:
I had a wonderful experience at this hotel. The staff was incredibly friendly and professional, and the service exceeded my expectations. I want to especially thank Mr. Chembe for the outstanding service at the beach. He was attentive, polite, and made sure everything was perfect during our meals. His warm hospitality really made our stay even more enjoyable.

Highly recommended, and I'll definitely come back again!

We really loved the Mediterranean beach restaurant! Amazing view and atmosphere, delicious food-one of the best salmons we have ever tried. Very welcoming and sincere personal, our absolute favorite was Alexandra-amazing warmhearted girl from India who made us feel genuinely very welcomed every time! Thank you, Alexandra!

Was a nice beach bar on the sea water. Unfortunately the pool was not included which was not clear online. We paid 200 AED (€93). Food and drinks were good and fast services. They changed towels if you want a new one, for no reason, your ice bucket were constantly changed, removed the sand from your sunbed, etc.. The service was really good.

places.address: No 1 Palm Jumeirah, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Palm Jumeirah is an impressive artificial island in Dubai, shaped like a palm frond and boasting high-end hotels, apartment towers, and beach clubs. The island is home to luxurious properties such as Atlantis The Royal, Atlantis The Palm, One&Only The Palm, Rixos The Palm, and Jumeirah Zabeel Saray. Visitors can enjoy the world's highest 360 infinity pool at Aura Skypool with breathtaking views.

sources.snippet: Palm Jumeirah Beach is an extraordinary feat, a man-made island in the shape of a palm tree that has become not only a symbol of architectural innovation but also hosts one of the best public beaches in Dubai. The beach offers ample parking, making it easy to visit, and there is no shortage of amenities including a plethora of restaurants and well-maintained restrooms. You can admire the majestic Atlantis Hotel, a landmark that itself contains a multitude of marine and entertainment attractions.
sources.shortName: 11 Best Beaches in Dubai

sources.snippet: While there are no public beaches in Palm Jumeirah, a great way to relax by the beach is to visit the WHITE Beach Club there. WHITE Beach Club has its own private beach and is located on the tip of the Palm Jumeirah artificial island. The beach club has a swimming pool that stays open into the night and the beach is open throughout the day.
sources.siteName: CuddlyNest Travel Blog | Unique Experiences and Travel Inspiration
sources.shortName: 8 Best Beaches In Dubai

sources.snippet: Dubai is a place where any project, however unlikely it may seem, can become a reality. One such dream is Palm Jumeirah, an artificial island shaped like a palm tree.
sources.shortName: Dubai's beautiful and lively beaches

places.name: Palm Jumeirah

reviews.text: Waugh!! Truly a wonder of architecture! Visited this beautiful man-made island in Dubai one evening, amazing views.
Palm Jumeirah is a beautiful place to explore. The experience was not bad, and the views are stunning. I recommend visiting in the evening for the best photos and sunset views.

I'll be honest.
It's really beautiful and interesting how they could think of creating such a marvel. But my question is, why though? Seriously, why? What was the need?
I mean Jebel Ali itself has a lot of interesting places.
No hate at all, I really like Palm Jumeirah, but couldn't help myself and ask why it was created? Simple answer.... Monnnnnnnaaaayyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy 🤑🤑💰💰 😂

places.address: The Palm Jumeirah - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Al Mamzer Beach, located in Dubai, is a popular destination for locals and tourists alike. The beach park offers a peaceful atmosphere with stunning landscapes of blue waters and lush palm and coconut trees. Visitors can enjoy various activities such as BBQs, jet skiing, sunbathing, swimming, picnicking, and more on its 5 sandy stretches. Families often visit the beach for water sports like kayaking and jet skiing while children can partake in various water games.

sources.snippet: Al Mamzar Beach Park contains five sections of beach across 106 hectares (262 acres), all monitored by lifeguards. There’s loads for families to do, including picnicking on the grass and burning some energy in the children’s play areas. There are also swimming pools, lagoons, beach coves for those needing shelter from the sun and plenty of places to eat.
sources.shortName: Best Public Beaches In Dubai

sources.snippet: One of those Dubai beaches that are loved by honeymooners, adventurers, and explorers equally, Al Mamzar Beach is a hidden gem you must discover on your visit to Dubai. The beach park with a peaceful aura has an extremely picturesque landscape.Adorned with blue shades of the water and green shades of Palm and Coconut trees, the ultramodern infrastructure of the beach park will ensure you spend a fun and easy day by the sea with your friends and family.Highlights: Al Mamzar Beach Park encompasses 5 sandy stretches apt for fun activities like BBQ, jet skiing, sunbathing, swimming, picnicking and whatnot.Location: Al Mamzar Beach Park, DubaiRecommended Read:  Best Places to Visit in Dubai For Honeymoon Amazing Watersports in Dubai
sources.shortName: 20 Best Beaches in Dubai For A Sun-Kissed Getaway

sources.snippet: Beach-goers who make a statement by avoiding Jumeirah often head to Al-Mamzar Beach Park. This area boasts 4 artificial but very pleasant beaches with separate swimming areas, lawns, summer houses, picnic areas, 2 swimming pools and various eateries. The romantic winding trails are perfect for a stroll or a bike ride, or board the train for a ride around the 90-hectare Al-Mamzar Beach Park.
sources.shortName: Travel Tips & Articles Dubai

sources.snippet: If you are looking for tranquility and a secluded beach vacation, then Al Mamzar Beach is the perfect option. It is a great place to enjoy some precious moments by the beachside in the lap of nature. Not just this, families can enjoy a pleasant time here too as Al Mamzar Beach has various activities for kids as well.
sources.shortName: Best 18 Beaches In Dubai That Will Bring You Close To Nature

sources.snippet: Mamzar Beach Park has several beaches and swimming pools where you can spend a day on the water. It is the ideal place for a picnic, and there is no need to bring anything as there are plenty of kiosks on the beach. Suppose you feel like having a hot and spicy barbecue in the sea breeze.
sources.shortName: Beaches in Dubai | Best Free Beaches Dubai

sources.snippet: Mamzar is a peaceful beach location with five beaches and a park. Generally used by families and has bathrooms, changing rooms, shower rooms, restaurants, a barbeque area, and swings. The admission charge to the park is 5 AED.
sources.shortName: 5 Best Free Beaches In Dubai For A Great Day By The Sea

sources.snippet: Located on the edge of the Dubai-Sharjah border, Mamzar Beach is a hidden gem in Dubai. There is an open beach section, a part of which goes through Mamzar Beach Park. Apart from swimming, there is a lot to do there.
sources.siteName: A blog about homes, trends, tips & life in the UAE | MyBayut
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai: Jumeirah, La Mer, Kite & More!

places.name: Al Mamzer Beach

reviews.text:
It's always my favourite spot to visit and stay calm for sometime

There are some restaurants and coffee shops nearby and some of them are my favourites

Parking is always available and easy to find

You can take bath and there are provisions for bathroom and change rooms nearby

For walking and cycling kind of physical activities this is best place

Kids can play and enjoy there time here

Only thing I don't like is people smoke here without any hesitation and you to be a passive smoker

Al Mamzar Beach is a wonderful place to relax and unwind! The view of the city lights at night is breathtaking. It's a great spot for barbecues, with plenty of picnic areas to enjoy with family and friends. absolutely stunning. It's a perfect place for a barbecue, with plenty of picnic spots to choose from. The beach itself is very clean, and I appreciate the presence of lifeguards constantly patrolling for safety. There's also a net for those who want to play beach volleyball, adding to the fun activities available. The toilets are well-maintained and designed to accommodate many visitors. Plus, the 5 AED entrance fee is absolutely worth it! Conveniently, there's a bus stop right at the entrance, making it easy to access. Highly recommended for a perfect day out!

We visited Al Mamzar Beach after work with colleagues, friends, and their families. We brought along our food, mats, and other essentials to enjoy a relaxing picnic by the beach. Watching the sunset together was such a highlight.. beautiful and calming. The beach was spacious, clean, and not too crowded, making it the perfect place to bond, share meals, and unwind. Highly recommended for group hangouts and peaceful beach evenings!

places.address: Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Bluewaters Island, located in Dubai, is a popular destination known for its stunning views and vibrant atmosphere. It is home to Ain Dubai, the world's largest observation wheel, offering breathtaking vistas of the city and coastline. Visitors can explore various dining, shopping, and entertainment options on the island, including the renowned Madame Tussauds Wax Museum. Additionally, adventure enthusiasts can partake in water sports like jet skiing and parasailing at Bluewaters Island Beach.

sources.snippet: Bluewaters Island Beach is a contemporary addition to Dubai's vibrant beach scene, situated on the man-made Bluewaters Island. It is located off the coast of Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR) and is easily accessible via a pedestrian bridge from JBR. Adventure seekers can enjoy jet skiing, parasailing, and flyboarding.Highlights: Situated on a man-made island, offering views of Ain Dubai and a lively atmosphere with various dining and entertainment options.Facilities: Restaurants, lounges, and direct access to The Beach Mall.
sources.shortName: 10 Beaches in Dubai Thats More Than Just Sun, Sand & Surf

places.name: Bluewaters Island

reviews.text: Bluewaters is one of the most beautiful places in Dubai, it's simply different. Breathtaking views, shops, restaurants, facilities, coastline, beaches and much more. Dubai Eye, It's creating memories 250m in the sky!
Beautiful waterfront destination with top-notch restaurants and stunning views. Perfect for a relaxed dinner by the sea. ❤️🔥
Can easily spend 1-2 hours here, evenings are pleasant and soothing to eyes. The Broadwalk was the best part of Bluewaters for me.

places.address: Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Barasti Beach is a vibrant beachfront venue in Dubai that offers a diverse range of global cuisine, including pizza, pasta, and meat plates, along with an assortment of drinks and pools. This popular bar is known for its energetic atmosphere and is always bustling with party lovers enjoying the lively ambiance. It hosts renowned DJs from around the world to keep the night alive with groovy tracks.

sources.snippet: Spend your days lounging on the beach and spend your nights drinking and dancing on wild beats of music, Barasti Beach is a must visit spot in Dubai for your next holiday. Popular for its wild party scene, this is the only beach in Dubai where alcohol is served.Bustling with fun locals and outsiders, the buoyant atmosphere of this beach is going to set your vacation mood right. Visit Barasti Beach with friends for a memorable experience full of surprises.Highlights: If you are a night owl, this beach is one of the most recommended beaches in the region where you can explore Dubai Nightlife.
sources.shortName: 20 Best Beaches in Dubai For A Sun-Kissed Getaway

sources.snippet: Barasti Beach is an ideal spot for party lovers as the beach hosts vibrant night parties that too with alcoholic drinks. The beach boasts of vast outdoor seating with mesmerizing vistas of the sea and a live sport big screen where live sport matches can be enjoyed while relishing fancy food and drinks. At night, you can enjoy some of the world's best DJs on this beach.
sources.shortName: Best 18 Beaches In Dubai That Will Bring You Close To Nature

places.name: Barasti Beach

reviews.text: Absolutely loved this beach club! 🌴 The pool was super clean and perfect for relaxing, with great music setting the vibe all day. There's direct access to the beach, so you can easily switch between poolside lounging and sea dips. The food was delicious - fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. And the drinks? Spot on. Great service, great energy - highly recommend for a perfect beach day!

Loved this beach club! The shaded pool area is perfect for staying cool while still enjoying the sun-soaked vibe. The beach itself is clean, peaceful, and not overly crowded-very relaxing. The food was a real highlight-fresh, tasty, and beautifully presented. I especially recommend the poke bowl! The cocktails were also refreshing! Great service, chilled atmosphere, and a perfect spot for both being in the pool by a beach and lunching.

I had the most amazing experience at Barasti Beach Club! The staff were absolutely wonderful, friendly, attentive, and always with a smile, making me feel so welcome.

The atmosphere is simply unmatched: stunning beach views, vibrant music, and that unique vibe you only find at Barasti.

The food was outstanding, fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. I can honestly say it's one of the best dining experiences I've had in Dubai.

I will definitely be coming back again and again, highly recommended! 🫶🏼

places.address: Le Meridien Mina Syahi Beach Resort & Marina, Dubai Marina - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Jumeirah Public Beach 02 - Walking Board is a popular destination in Dubai, known for its clean white sand and warm blue waters. It's one of the biggest beaches in the area, offering ample space to relax and enjoy the surroundings. The beach features a boardwalk, benches, showers, and a modern playground for kids. With round-the-clock lifeguard services and blue flag status, it's considered safe for swimming.

sources.snippet: Open all year round, Jumeirah Beach, also known as Jumeirah Open Beach, is a long, sandy strip in Dubai. You can indulge in a whole myriad of watersports at this popular beach, including paddle boarding and jet-skiing. It’s also a great place for those envy-inducing selfies, perfect for posting on Insta!
sources.siteName: A blog about homes, trends, tips & life in the UAE | MyBayut
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai: Jumeirah, La Mer, Kite & More!

places.name: Jumeirah Public Beach 02 - Walking Board

reviews.text:
Jumeirah 2 Public Beach is one of the most convenient family-friendly spots in the city. Open 24 hours, with a FREE large parking area (July 25), clean showers, changing rooms, and restrooms that are well-maintained.

There's a great playground for kids and a workout area for those who like to stay active. A nice running track runs along the beach, and you'll find a small supermarket, pizzas and Subway nearby, including SALT to enjoy a nice burger.

Only downside is the water tends to be still, not ideal if you're expecting waves. Still, a great place to relax, walk, or enjoy a calm swim.

Jumeirah Night Beach is such a vibe! The beach looks beautiful under the moonlight, with the sound of waves and the cool breeze making it a perfect spot to relax. It's clean, peaceful, and not overly crowded at night. The view of the Burj Al Arab lit up in the distance adds a magical touch. Great place for a late evening stroll or just to sit by the shore and unwind. Definitely recommend if you're looking for a calm and breezy beach experience in Dubai after sunset!

I recently visited the Dubai Beaches at Jumeirah 2 and had a generally good experience. One of the things I appreciated most was the convenience-the shower and comfort rooms were nearby, making it easy to freshen up after a swim. There's also a beautiful bridge that's definitely Instagram-worthy and adds a nice visual touch to the area.

I also noticed that there are staff actively working to maintain the cleanliness of the beach area, which is great to see. However, despite their efforts, I still spotted some trash floating in the water, which was a bit disappointing. Hopefully, more can be done to keep the water as clean as the surroundings.

Overall, it's a pleasant spot to relax, especially if you enjoy taking photos. With a little more attention to water cleanliness, it could be even better.

places.address: 664R+QH3, Jumeira St, Jumeirah - Jumeirah 2 - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Dubai Islands Beach, located in the up-and-coming neighborhood of Dubai Islands, is quickly gaining popularity as a family-friendly destination with amenities for both humans and their furry friends. This beach offers various water sports activities for adventure seekers and provides facilities for football and volleyball enthusiasts. What sets this beach apart is its pet-friendly policy, allowing dog owners to enjoy the sun, sand, and surf with their four-legged companions.

sources.snippet: People who live in Dubai have it pretty good, but it hasn’t always been the easiest city to navigate for pet owners, with many public areas off-limits for dogs. However, with the addition of Dubai’s first official dog-friendly public beach, things are starting to change. Located along Dubai’s northern coastline, near Deira’s waterfront, the new Dubai Islands Beach allows leashed dogs of all shapes and sizes to enjoy the waves (within a designated area) and play in the sand.
sources.shortName: The best beaches in Dubai

sources.snippet: Dubai Islands Beach: Dubai Islands Beach, named after its burgeoning waterfront neighborhood, is emerging as the newest destination in the city for a rejuvenating swim and seaside entertainment. Situated off the coast of Deira, Dubai’s historic center, it stands out as the city’s inaugural fully pet-friendly beach, welcoming paw parents to bring their canine companions for a play date.
sources.siteName: Find Top Trending Blogs, Business Blog, Travel Blog | TBO Academy
sources.shortName: All you Need to Know about Beaches in Dubai 2024

sources.snippet: Named after its up-and-coming neighbourhood on the water, Dubai Islands Beach is emerging as the latest spot in the city for a refreshing dip and shoreside entertainment. Located off the coast of Dubai’s older hub – Deira – it is the city’s first fully pet-friendly beach, allowing owners to bring their dogs along for a scenic jog or swim.
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai in 2024

sources.snippet: What sets this beach apart is its pet-friendly policy, allowing your furry friends to frolic in the waters. In addition to swimming, beach volleyball, and football, you can grab a bite at nearby coffee and ice cream shops, with more eateries set to open soon.

reviews.text:
The beach at the end near the current exit is clean for swimming but the start is very bad with green algae and dead star fish all over. But I love the place....to spend the night and see the beautiful sunrise.

I'll share some photos below which I clicked there.

Pet friendly with area for pet swimming too.

Absolutely love this place. What a hidden gem 💎😍
Also have to appreciate that the beach is pet friendly 😊 so please dog owners please 🙏🏻 pick up after your pets and keep it clean for all visitors.
The parking around the area is still developing but the place has a great potential to grow to a tourist attraction.

Clean, free sun beds, beautiful sunset, pet is allowed, quiet at the moment… there are few parking space..over all beautiful but theres lots of jelly fish.. which i was scared to go back to the water coz i actually hold the jelly fish thinking it was an algae 🤣 there were also toilets, starbucks and baskin & robbins present .

places.address: Dubai Islands - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Bla Bla Dubai is a luxurious beach club and restaurant offering a diverse range of Japanese, Italian, and American cuisine. The establishment features 20 themed bars spread across purpose-built spaces connected by a thrilling metal tube slide from the top floor to the ground.

sources.snippet: A massive one-of-a-kind experience at JBR, Bla Bla has something for everyone. With multiple lounges, restaurants and a beach club, this social destination caters to all tastes and cravings. Bla Bla is a one-stop-shop where you swim and lounge pool-side, dine and spend the evening with friends moving from venue to venue.
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai in 2024

places.name: Bla Bla Dubai

reviews.text:
We found this place on a YouTube channel and realized we were sitting right next to it on the beach! So, of course, we had to go for a couple of drinks this time, it was cider, hehe. 🤣 Much needed to cool off after getting a little sunburned that day.

In this place also events is going on, when we were sitting there for an hour or so they were preparing for something downstairs outside.

The prices are great, especially during happy hour you buy one, get one free! 🍹 The location is perfect, right on a beautiful sandy beach with stunning views of the sea, Dubai Ain, and the city. 🌅✨

Great bar for drinks and cocktails, on JBR beach.
Had the kids with us, so couldn't go down to the party pool, as is for adults only. But I was glad to get refreshed on the cocktails after a long day sunbathing along the beach 🍹🏖️

A stylish venue with an effortlessly cool vibe. The atmosphere strikes the perfect balance lively without being chaotic, with great music and a chic crowd. Surprisingly impressive food for a bar: well presented, flavorful, and satisfying. The cocktails are inventive, and the service is smooth and attentive. All in all, a thoughtfully curated spot ideal for a night out. I'd absolutely return. 🤍

places.address: The Beach, JBR, 5101 Messer Street, Jumeirah Beach Residence - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Zero Gravity Dubai is a unique beach club and nightlife destination located near the Skydive Dubai Drop Zone. It offers a variety of venues for dining, relaxation, and entertainment. Guests can enjoy a private pool and beach area with sun loungers, cabanas, and beach barbecues. The club also features a Garden Lounge with stunning views of Dubai Marina, perfect for private parties or enjoying shisha with friends.

sources.snippet: Day to night, Zero Gravity Dubai Beach Club is the heart of beachside revelry. With its massive pool, extensive beach area, and top-tier DJs, it's the place for anyone looking to party in style. But it's not all about the party; with its fancy dining options and luxurious lounges, Zero Gravity offers a holistic beach club experience, being a family beach club in Dubai.
sources.shortName: Top 15 Beaches In Dubai For A Perfect Getaway You Must Visit

places.name: Zero Gravity Dubai

reviews.text:
There are some places that instantly make you feel like you're on vacation the moment you step in-and this beach club is one of them.

What I appreciated most was the attention to comfort: clean and modern changing rooms stocked with fresh towels, bath amenities.
The staff is the friendliest I've encountered.

But let me tell you about the “Bed in Breakfast” served every Sunday from 9:00-12:00. That was the real treat. For just 75 dirhams, I had access to a buffet that felt more like a curated culinary spread. From savory bites like salmon bagels and eggs benedict to sweet options like açai bowls, fresh fruit, flaky croissants, and even ice cream, everything was beautifully presented and full of flavor. There was a lovely cheese and charcuterie selection, and a rotation of smoothies that made you feel both indulgent and healthy at once. And yes, it was unlimited-food and drinks both-which made the value unbeatable.

One detail that truly stood out was the personal touch from Chef Ali. In the middle of the relaxed morning vibe, he came by with a warm smile to ask if everything was to my liking-and whether I had any suggestions for improving their service. It's rare to see that kind of care and humility from the person behind the kitchen, and it left a lasting impression. You could tell he wasn't just cooking meals-he was crafting an experience.

What made it even better was being able to enjoy all this while still having full access to the pool and beach. No rushing, no moving around-you could enjoy your breakfast slowly, then wander down to the water or lounge at your sunbed with a fresh juice in hand.

It's rare to find a place that combines atmosphere, quality, and value so seamlessly-but this beach club nailed it. Whether you're in the mood for a relaxing solo morning or a full day with friends, it's the kind of place you'll want to return to again and again.

I went to Zero Gravity Dubai yesterday and it was fantastic!
The seaside location is stunning, with a pool and good music always playing.
I tried a menu with three different tacos, all really tasty and unique, especially the sweet one, which I loved. Highly recommend it!
A perfect spot to enjoy the sun, music, and great vibes. I'd love to go back!

ro Gravity Dubai is truly one of the best beach clubs in the city! The atmosphere is unmatched – stunning beach views, a lively vibe, and the perfect mix of relaxation and entertainment. The pool and beach area are spotless, with plenty of comfortable seating and great music throughout the day.

The service is excellent, the staff are attentive and always welcoming, and the food & drinks are top-notch – fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. Whether you're here for brunch, sunset, or a night out, the energy is always incredible.

A must-visit spot in Dubai if you're looking for a luxury beach club experience with a fun and vibrant crowd. Highly recommend!

places.address: Dubai Marina, Skydive Dubai Drop Zone, King Salman Bin Abdulaziz Al Saud St, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: La Mer Beach in Jumeirah, Dubai is a perfect spot for a relaxing day by the sea. With its white sandy shores and palm-fringed backdrop, it offers a range of activities for beachgoers. From water sports like Jet Ski trips, boating, fly-boarding, and kayaking to sun loungers for those who prefer to unwind on the sand. The beach also boasts art installations and a variety of dining options nearby.

sources.snippet: This is one of the most complete beaches in Dubai, as not only does it offer you a beautiful sandy beach dotted with palm trees in one of Jumeirah’s most exclusive areas, but there’s also an attractive range of activities on offer here. At Mer Beach you can start the day by strolling along the beach, lying in a hammock or doing some water sports, and continue with a good dose of culture and cuisine. There are a number of art installations on this beach, as well as lively bars and restaurants with a wide range of cuisine.
sources.shortName: Dubai's beautiful and lively beaches

sources.snippet: Formerly Jumeirah Public Beach, La Mer Beach in Dubai has beautiful wooden walkways and beachside promenades as well as vibrant artwork and graffiti murals. The beach has shacks to cool down and public showers to wash down, as well as water sports equipment on rent at nominal prices.Highlights: A vibrant beachfront destination with colorful street art, retail, dining, and entertainment options.Facilities: Restaurants, shops, water sports, changing rooms, and showers.
sources.shortName: 10 Beaches in Dubai Thats More Than Just Sun, Sand & Surf

sources.snippet: If you’re looking for a beach experience that combines sun-soaked relaxation with lively entertainment, look no further than La Mer Beach. Located in the vibrant Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR) area, this trendy beach destination offers a plethora of activities for all ages. Indulge in retail therapy at the beachside boutiques, savor delicious culinary delights at trendy restaurants, or simply bask in the sun on the soft sandy shores.
sources.siteName: CuddlyNest Travel Blog | Unique Experiences and Travel Inspiration
sources.shortName: 8 Best Beaches In Dubai

sources.snippet: La Mer is known for its seaside restaurants, cafés, ice cream parlours, and other eateries, a destination for all ages. There are beach bars on end, with al fresco dining and drinks with panoramic views from outdoor terraces. The beautiful shoreline is lined with brightly painted beach cabanas, and the water is open for swimming from sunrise to sunset.
sources.shortName: Best Beautiful public Beaches in Dubai

sources.snippet: La Mer Beach, once one of Dubai’s favorite beach destinations, is currently closed for renovations until the end of 2024. This area, part of the bustling La Mer development by Meraas, used to be cherished for its cinema, shops, and restaurants. Now, only a small section remains open for swimming until 5 PM daily.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches in Dubai

sources.snippet: La Mer Beach in Dubai perfectly combines city life and beach relaxation. The beach is not just a place to enjoy the sand and waves; it's an entire experience. La Mer creates a seamless blend of urban chic and seaside charm with trendy boutiques, gourmet restaurants, and unique art installations.
sources.shortName: Top 15 Beaches In Dubai For A Perfect Getaway You Must Visit

sources.snippet: With funky murals, clear waters and stark white sands, La Mer Beach is a great addition to the urban beaches of Dubai. Boasting a slew of palm trees and colourful graffiti, it is perfect for some laid-back family fun. La Mer Beach is located in Jumeirah, promising hours of pure relaxation!
sources.siteName: A blog about homes, trends, tips & life in the UAE | MyBayut
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai: Jumeirah, La Mer, Kite & More!

sources.snippet: Imagine the lively coastal village of your fantasies when you close your eyes. If you like glistening blue seas, silky white sand, palm-tree-lined walkways, La Mer is for you. Apart from that, it’s a hip dining and shopping destination in and of itself.
sources.shortName: 5 Best Free Beaches In Dubai For A Great Day By The Sea

sources.snippet: Spend a laid-back day at La Mer beach with premium eateries, entertainment, and adventure spots. The family-friendly beach has shallow water, so take your kids with you. After an energizing sea bath, use the showers and relax on a water hammock.
sources.shortName: Beaches in Dubai | Best Free Beaches Dubai

sources.snippet: La Mer is a perfect example of when imagination comes to reality - just like Dubai itself. It is an artificial beach meaning it is a man-made beach development. However, it is in no way less than any other natural beaches.
sources.shortName: Check out the list of best beaches in Dubai 2023

sources.snippet: Meraas’s hottest location, La Mer has captured hearts from the start. The water at La Mer Beach is soft and ideal for water sports. This harbor beach is protected by construction from both sides.
sources.shortName: 5 Best Beaches in Dubai, UAE – COÉGA Sunwear

sources.snippet: La Mer Beach is one of the best family beaches in Dubai where there’s something for everyone. Get a kick out of swimming in the cool water, or let the gorgeous Dubai beach view mesmerize you.
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai - Top 12 Dubai Beaches to discover

places.name: La mer beach

reviews.text: One of my favourite beaches in Dubai. Blue waters, white clean sand just perfect for swimming and it's not overcrowded. It has a beautiful views of sunset. The lifeguards will ask you to leave the beach once the sunsets, however you can walk around and stay at the promenade. Highly highly recommend this beach.

Nice beach, clear water, and rather clean. I would give it 3 ⭐️ for the simple fact everything around it is closed and looks like a ghost town. Nice cars but no open restaurants just building on building that are all vacant. The artwork all around is nice but it's faded drastically year by year. It's a shame because it's a really nice place and the Hyatt is close but it seems like a old western ghost town.

La Mer Beach is a lovely place to spend an evening in Dubai. The beach is clean, well-maintained, and has a relaxed vibe with plenty of open space to walk, sit, or enjoy the sunset. There are lots of cafes, restaurants, and beachside lounges to explore - perfect for a casual evening out.

Getting there can be a bit tricky though, as public transport isn't very frequent in this area. It's best to take a taxi or drive if you want to avoid the hassle.

Overall, it's a great spot for a peaceful stroll, some light shopping, or just to sit back and enjoy the sea breeze.

places.address: Jumeirah 1 - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: WHITE Beach Dubai is a trendy beach club located in Atlantis, The Palm. It's a popular spot known for its stunning infinity pool, lounge terrace, and private sunbeds with views of the Arabian Gulf and the city skyline. The Mediterranean-inspired White Restaurant offers a diverse menu from light bites to main dishes, perfect for enjoying by the pool or on the buzzing terrace. Guests can relax on floating beds or in poolside cabanas while taking in uninterrupted views of Palm Jumeirah.

sources.snippet: Dubai is awash with beach clubs and White Beach is one of its best. Located at mega-resort Atlantis, The Palm, it’s a boho retreat with crochet parasols, natural wood cabanas, two Instagram-worthy pools and an al fresco restaurant. Insider tip: Spoil yourself by booking a private pool cabana.
sources.shortName: The best beaches in Dubai

sources.snippet: Yet to re-open for the winter season, we’re all eagerly awaiting the relaunch of WHITE Beach. This super-trendy beach club and bar is the place for a proper party by the sea. There’s a huge infinity pool plus a diamond-shaped swimming pool that was added last year, along with new front-row sunbeds and luxury cabins that come with private plunge pools.
sources.shortName: Best beaches in Dubai: 30 of the best revealed

sources.snippet: Tropical vibes with a touch of Dubai's opulence - that's what this beach offers. Located at the iconic Atlantis, The Palm, this beach club is where the city's elite come to play. With its white sandy beachfront, crystal clear waters, and lush palm trees, it's easy to forget you're in the heart of the desert.
sources.shortName: Top 15 Beaches In Dubai For A Perfect Getaway You Must Visit

places.name: WHITE Beach Dubai

reviews.text: Such a beautiful and relaxing beach club! The atmosphere was peaceful, with stunning views of the sea and a very chill vibe. The loungers were super comfortable, the music was perfect, and the staff was friendly and attentive. The food and drinks were delicious and served quickly. It's the ideal place to spend the day, whether you want to sunbathe, swim, or just enjoy the scenery. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a beautiful spot by the beach!

It's a beautiful beach, but of course, it comes at a price. I thought it was a bit overpriced for beach access. But everything is very clean, well-maintained, and tidy, and you can even get something to nibble on. It's more of a "see and be seen" and "look, we have the money" kind of thing here. Great for anyone looking for prestige and contacts. I'm taking off one star for the exorbitant prices.

We visited over the weekend and here's a quick breakdown of our experience:

Food – We had a few cocktails, mini wagyu burgers with fries, and tacos. The cocktails were okay but a bit weak. Burgers were fine, and the fries were actually great. Unfortunately, the tacos were disappointing-bland, served in chips instead of tortillas, and only three small pieces for AED 190. Given the price, I expected much better quality and quantity.

Service – The staff were very polite and friendly, which I appreciated. However, it was difficult to get service at times-there often wasn't anyone around when we wanted to order. Also, being directly asked if we wanted to add a tip felt a bit uncomfortable.

Ambience – The pool area is beautiful, with well-designed sunbeds, shades, and a great location right by the sea. It did get a bit too crowded and loud for my liking in the afternoon once the party vibe kicked in.

places.address: Atlantis, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Jumeirah Public Beach is a popular destination in Dubai, offering a stretch of white sand and opportunities for surfboarding. It provides stunning views of the renowned Burj Al Arab hotel and boasts world-class facilities for visitors to enjoy. The beach is perfect for families and friends, with various activities available. Additionally, the area features other beautiful beaches such as JBR Beach, Dubai Marina, Umm Suqeim Beach, and Kite Beach.

sources.snippet: Jumeirah Public Beach is one of those beaches in Dubai which are popular among tourists and locals alike. Whether you are visiting Dubai with your friends or family, this beach guarantees a fun-filled experience with a wide range of activities and world-class facilities for you to avail.For the most magical experience, visit Jumeirah Public Beach during sunset.Highlights: This man-made beach, bordered by buildings exhibiting top-notch futuristic architecture, is among the most wonderful spectacles you will witness while you're in Dubai. Location: Jumeirah District, DubaiClick Here to Book: Scuba Diving in DubaiAlso Check: Best Cafes in Dubai
sources.shortName: 20 Best Beaches in Dubai For A Sun-Kissed Getaway

places.name: Public Beach

reviews.text: This public beach has serene view with peace full vibes. Local name Umm Suqeim Beach. It's free entry beach. I liked their available facilities like female changing room, sufficient sitting table chair at every few steps's distances, tea/coffee/juice shop and also has facilities for washing your feet. The whole area is very clean and well maintained I must say.
every time its amzing to relfect on my own . just i wish there was a ladies only beach section. as its not comfortable if i ever enjoyed beach at all. i dont know

The beach itself is nice and located close to a bus stop (approx 10mins walks from bus station) and a cross the road of car parking which i think is free. However, it is right next to a construction site. In the morning (around 10-10:30 AM to 1 PM) it's peaceful and not too crowded, but after that it gets busy with people standing very close to your things (tourist that just finish Burj Al Arab tour) and still coming and taking pics on the beach right next to your stuff and belongings.
Also, most of construction workers also come to the beach even though they are not allowed to be there on that area only further away, they don't always behave respectfully , they asked me to take pictures with me and my mum was next to me in the water. They are recording themself in water and also record like selfies but you dont know if they actually record you or no.
Gentleman on scooter /  security guard went above and beyond, he tried to keep them away and let the other people enjoy on the beach and have a wonderful time with family, friends etc.
Lifeguards were very attentive, and they was always on point, telling people not to cross the buoy lines, their supervisor was going back and forth with a car, very nice.
Restrooms , changing rooms, showers very clean.  10/10.
All this is my personal opinion, overall i love the beach, not so many ppl in the morning, just be ready for crowd from close to 1pm .

places.address: Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: DRIFT Dubai, nestled within the One&Only Royal Mirage, offers a luxurious beachfront experience with an infinity pool and a private beach. The elegant restaurant serves organic French-Mediterranean cuisine inspired by Provence. Guests can savor dishes like Les Escargots and Cote De Veau Milanaise while dining on the terrace under the starry sky. This chic spot is perfect for a romantic day out or a lazy afternoon lounging in private cabanas by the Arabian Gulf.

sources.snippet: DRIFT at the One&Only Royal Mirage is one of the classiest clubs of them all. The beach is a beaut, the sun-dappled, Provencal-inspired restaurant is lovely and the bar is a fabulous spot for sundowners. For a real treat, the luxury island beds set by the infinity pool are the way to go (a bottle of premium sparkling grape is included in the price).From Dhs150 Mon-Thurs, from Dhs200 Fri-Sun.
sources.shortName: Best beaches in Dubai: 30 of the best revealed

sources.snippet: Attracting a chic crowd that want Mediterranean elegance, this airy beach club has a private stretch of beach, an infinity pool, and plenty of plush sun loungers. Staff roam between blue umbrellas serving complimentary sparkling water and seasonal fruit bowls. For an upgrade, there’s a VIP package that comes with a private cabana and Moet.
sources.shortName: 11 of the best beach spots you need to try in Dubai

sources.snippet: Nestled in the plush surrounds of One&Only Royal Mirage, this adults-only beach club is far from ordinary. Laze by the infinity pool, enjoy a lunch in the sunshine with friends, or simply lounge by the soft sands. The private beach club looks out over a kilometre of  prime beachfront with sweeping views of Dubai’s skyline.
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai in 2024

sources.snippet: A common feature of Dubai’s beaches is the enclosing of private spaces. Hotels often do this and set up exclusive beach clubs where you can spend a fantastic day with everything you need. Can you see yourself on one of the luxurious Balinese beds at Drift Beach, swimming in an infinity pool overlooking Palm Island Bay?
sources.shortName: Dubai's beautiful and lively beaches

sources.snippet: DRIFT Beach Club is a relatively new beach in Dubai since its opening in 2017. It is a vibrant, elegant beach where you can get immersed in the peacefulness of the breathtaking view of the Palm Islands and the sea. some peace and quiet and the charming view of Palm Islands and, of course, the sea.
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai - Top 12 Dubai Beaches to discover

places.name: DRIFT Dubai

reviews.text:
I celebrated my birthday at Drift Beach Club, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! The atmosphere is simply stunning, with a touch of luxury and elegance that makes every moment special.

The staff was incredibly friendly and attentive, making us feel pampered from start to finish. The carefully curated details and the refined environment made my celebration unforgettable.

I highly recommend Drift to anyone looking for an exclusive and memorable experience!

The pool area is gorgeous-super clean and spacious, with amazing views of the city. The vibe is relaxed but still feels upscale, which is exactly what I was looking for. The staff were really friendly and made sure we had everything we needed, but without being overbearing. It's a great spot if you want to kick back and enjoy a chill day, or if you're just looking to cool off in style. It's worth it for the overall experience. Definitely recommend checking it out if you're in Dubai!

I visited Drift Beach Dubai for Ladies Night ,  perfect place to feel like you're on the French Riviera without leaving Dubai.
The atmosphere is a 10 out of 10 - stylish, relaxed, and effortlessly aesthetic. Every detail is thoughtfully curated - from the table setting to the music making it a perfect spot for both casual gatherings and special occasions.
The menu features a diverse range of dishes, highlighting cuisine. Diners can savor a variety of flavorful options, from perfectly grilled salmon to innovative appetizers that tantalize the taste buds. The use of high-quality ingredients is evident in every dish, and the presentation is nothing short of artful.
Service at Drift Beach is attentive yet relaxed, with staff members who are knowledgeable about the menu and eager to make recommendations. One of the standout features is the outdoor seating area, which provides breathtaking views of the sunset over the water, creating an unforgettable backdrop for any meal. In addition, the cocktail menu is impressive, offering creative mixes that complement the dining experience perfectly. Drift Beach Restaurant is a must-visit for anyone looking to enjoy a memorable culinary experience in Dubai. With its combination of delicious food, stunning views, and excellent service, it's a place you'll want to return to time and again.

places.address: One&Only Royal Mirage, Dubai Marina - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Palm West Beach is a stunning stretch of coastline that offers a picturesque view of the Dubai Marina skyline. It's not just your average beach - it's a vibrant hub with plenty to offer. Take a leisurely stroll along the boulevard and you'll come across trendy spots like Koko Bay and Jones The Grocer, perfect for indulging in Far Eastern flavors or family-friendly treats.

sources.snippet: Work on your swagger before strolling the length of Palm West Beach. Peacocking along its promenade – or people-watching those who do – is the predominate pastime on this trendy shoreline. Backed by five-star hotels, the sand is divided into plots occupied by beach clubs, bars and restaurants, each one pumping out competing baselines.
sources.shortName: The best beaches in Dubai

sources.snippet: Sun and sea worshippers will find plenty to do on the shores of Palm Jumeirah at Palm West Beach. With all-day beachfront entertainment, watersports, restaurants and the best Dubai skyline views on the 1.6km of promenade and beachfront, be prepared to have a fun time with your friends and family – as well as your pets!. Get your daily dose of exercise along the walking and running trail, indulge in lazy seaside breakfasts, or build sandcastles against the backdrop of picture-perfect sunsets.
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai in 2024

sources.snippet: Located on the ‘trunk’ of Dubai’s man-made landmark Palm Jumeirah, Palm West Beach is a buzzing and rapidly developing promenade offering oceanside restaurants and bars for every appetite and mood. On its sands sits Kyma Beach, where Greek dips and seafood risotto make for an upscale lunch stop. Or tuck into a juicy lobster roll with your toes in the sand at Surf Club, snack on artisanal pizza at Cucina, or enjoy an elegant Mediterranean meal at Lucky Fish.
sources.shortName: The best beaches in Dubai

sources.snippet: Palm West Beach is another popular beachfront destination in Dubai. Take stunning pictures of the Dubai skyline on the 1.6-kilometre beachfront promenade or enjoy a feast with your friends and family at the several restaurants and cafes dotted along the beach. There are countless options for watersports such as kayaking, paddle boarding, surfing, electric hydrofoil surfing, sea bikes, catamarans and VR diving.
sources.siteName: A blog about homes, trends, tips & life in the UAE | MyBayut
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai: Jumeirah, La Mer, Kite & More!

sources.snippet: Palm West Beach offers an exclusive stretch of sand with waterfront views and luxurious dining. Enjoy all-day seaside fun, from morning workouts to beachfront brunches, and relax by the sun beds with a drink in hand. After soaking up the sun, indulge in delicious meals at beachside restaurants like Black Flamingo, February 30 or Maison de le Plage.
sources.shortName: 10 of the best beaches in Dubai for fun in the sun

places.name: Palm West Beach by Dubai Retail

reviews.text: A night walk along the beach pathway is a truly relaxing experience. The gentle sound of waves lapping at the shore, combined with the cool sea breeze, creates a tranquil atmosphere that soothes the mind. The pathway is well-lit, allowing you to stroll safely while taking in the stunning views of the moon reflecting on the water. Whether you're alone or with loved ones, the serene surroundings provide the perfect backdrop for quiet reflection or deep conversation. The beauty of the night sky and the rhythmic sound of the ocean make this a perfect way to unwind after a busy day. Overall, it's a rejuvenating escape that leaves you feeling refreshed and at peace.
Excellent place for a jog, walk. Also plenty restaurant options. Beautiful place by the beach.
One of the most elegant places to visit and chilling in Dubai, I recommend visiting this beautiful place with your friends or girlfriend, groups, note : don't take your wife to enjoy 😉😂

places.address: 444V+J99, West Beach, The Palm Jumeirah - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Club Vista Mare, located on Palm Jumeirah, offers a diverse dining experience with a variety of restaurants to choose from. The relaxed promenade provides stunning views of the water and is home to several enticing eateries including Caribbean spot Ras Beach Vibes, Italian restaurant La Cucina, and gastropub-style venue The Tap House. As day turns into night, the area is illuminated by twinkling lights creating a magical ambiance.

sources.snippet: Club Vista Mare, located on Palm Jumeirah, offers a relaxed atmosphere with spectacular views. Take a dip in the tranquil waters and let your worries melt away as you spend time with your loved ones or indulge in stand-up paddle boarding and watersports. With upscale lifestyle and dining destinations such as Ibn Albahar, Limonata, and Ría overlooking the sand, you’re in for a wholesome beach day out.
sources.shortName: 10 of the best beaches in Dubai for fun in the sun

It's most famous place in Dubai i'm having a great service great food. You will drink eat Chill in beach. And there is kids place is you will enjoy with your friends to your family everyone

It's very nice place and there is different 6 restaurant Italian Turkish American. Amazing service amazing stuff you will enjoy 100 person. Please visit it one time even the food is amazing

places.address: Palm Jumeirrah, Palm, Jumeirah - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Umm Suqeim Night Swimming Beach in Dubai has become a beloved spot for both locals and visitors, especially with the recent initiative to open beaches at night. This innovative approach allows everyone to escape the summer heat while enjoying the refreshing evening breeze. Families gather here under the watchful eyes of trained lifeguards, making it a safe haven for nighttime fun.

sources.snippet: Dubbed Sunset Beach, this sweep of shore is at its best in the late afternoon, and not just because of its revered dusk views. It’s one of Dubai’s few designated night-swimming locations, so stick around after sundown to see floodlights bathe the sand and take a dip in dark waters. Insider tip: Dine at Bu Qtair, originally a simple beach shack that has been serving the catch of the day since the Eighties.
sources.shortName: The best beaches in Dubai

sources.snippet: Residents call Umm Suqeim 2 Beach by many names, but it’s named after its location to make it easy for you.This genuine and popular beach is situated right next to Jumeirah Beach Hotel, in front of Umm Suqeim Park. It’s perfect for enjoying the beauty of the sunset with the iconic Burj Al Arab, although the view is now partially obscured by the completed Jumeirah Beach Hotel. The beach is super crowded on weekends but offers great facilities such as a running track, showers, and a few cafes.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Best Beaches in Dubai

sources.snippet: If you want those Instagram-worthy pics of the Burj Al Arab, Dubai's photogenic seven-star ultra-luxury hotel, Umm Suqeim Beach is the place to go. This is another wide, flat beach along the coastline, right where the Burj is located (it's on its own little peninsula jutting out in the sea). The area is just a beach with few services, except for lifeguard stands and basic facilities (toilets, showers, and changing rooms).
sources.shortName: Beaches in Dubai | PlanetWare

sources.snippet: Dubai opened up three of its beaches for night swimming in May this year, with extra lighting, dedicated electronic screens with safety information and dedicated lifeguards. Our top pick is an 800m-stretch near Sunset Beach, but there are also options in Jumeirah 1 and 2.Free. Daily from sunset-sunrise.
sources.shortName: Best beaches in Dubai: 30 of the best revealed

places.name: Umm Suqeim Night Swimming Beach, Dubai

reviews.text: Relaxing beach that's open 24/7. If you enjoy night swimming, you will definitely love it. However, I also recommend going to the beach at the sunset. The view is amazing, and you can stay in the water even after the sun sets.

Umm Suqeim Night Swimming Beach is a fantastic spot for a refreshing nighttime swim. The beach is well-lit, clean, and offers stunning views of the Burj Al Arab lit up against the night sky. It's a peaceful and unique experience, perfect for cooling off in the evening. A must-visit if you're looking to enjoy Dubai's beachside after dark!

⭐⭐
Disappointing Night Beach Visit – Safety Concerns Overshadow the Ambience

I was excited to experience Umm Suqeim Night Swimming Beach for an evening swim under the stars. The setting-with views of the illuminated Burj Al Arab and cool night air-is undeniably impressive. However, the experience was dampened by serious safety issues. The beach felt poorly guarded, and there were reports of assaults and mobile phone thefts at night. This casts a shadow over what should be a peaceful outing. Unless security is visibly stepped up, I'd recommend caution-especially after dark.

places.address: 23 Street 2A, Umm Suqeim - Jumeirah 3 - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Azure Beach Dubai, located within the Rixos Premium Hotel at Dubai Marina, offers a Mediterranean-inspired seaside experience without the hassle of crowded beaches. Nestled in JBR Dubai with stunning views of the Arabian Gulf, this beach club provides a relaxing atmosphere to soak up the sun and enjoy al fresco dining in private cabanas by the pool.

sources.snippet: The pool here is huge, the giant sun loungers are comfy, beach access is included, there’s a lush green lawn for lazing and the views out over the Arabian Gulf are stellar. Spend the day, enjoy the sunset, then decide if you’re going to stay to party the night away.Dhs200 (Dhs100 redeemable), Mon-Thurs, Dhs300 (Dhs150 redeemable) Fri-Sun.
sources.shortName: Best beaches in Dubai: 30 of the best revealed

places.name: Azure Beach Dubai

reviews.text:
Spent an amazing day at the beach and it couldn't have been better! The weather was perfect, with clear blue skies and just the right breeze. The sand was soft, clean, and warm-ideal for relaxing and walking barefoot.

The water was crystal clear and refreshing, great for swimming and just floating around to escape the heat. There were plenty of shaded areas and spots to lay down a towel and unwind. Also loved the chill beach vibes-music playing in the background, families enjoying picnics, and people playing volleyball and having fun.

The little beach café nearby served cold drinks and snacks, which added to the overall relaxing vibe. Watching the sunset at the end of the day was the perfect way to wrap it all up.

Highly recommend for anyone looking for a peaceful yet fun day out by the water!

While staying at the beach, we went for lunch at Azure restaurant, located by the pools of the Rixos hotel. We tried poke bowl with tuna, vegetable maki, ceasar salad, pasta from kids menu, Pizza Margharita and special non alcoholic lemonade Citrine. Everything was fresh, delicious and beautifully decorated. We visited the restaurant on Saturday and party music was playing throughout the lunch, creating a great atmosphere. We would like to thank the waiter named Baker for the quick and professional service. You can also enjoy food from this restaurant on the beach, but beware of voracious seagulls. In addition to the food, we also recommend fresh coconut water and almond cappuccino. More on @larmarluxury.

Multipools at Rixos hotel JBR. They have multiple level pools and a private beach. I have tried most of the food menu, the food is good in general. The sushi, salads and pizzas were good. The service sometimes slow especially at the beach. But if Angelo and Marvin are there the service will be quick and efficient and they will tend to all your requests..

places.address: Rixos Premium Dubai, Jumeirah Beach Residence - Dubai, United Arab Emirates

places.generalDescription: Riva Beach Club is a well-established beach retreat in Dubai, offering a range of amenities for visitors. It boasts an outdoor lounge, bar, Italian restaurant, gym, and swimming pool. The club caters to families with a dedicated pool for children and is also dog-friendly. Guests can enjoy the expansive temperature-controlled pool and private beach with views of the Burj Al Arab. The venue offers Mediterranean cuisine at Riva Ristorante and provides day passes for individuals or couples on weekdays.

sources.snippet: One of Dubai’s best all-round beach clubs and a great pick for families thanks to the chilled atmosphere, spacious strip of beach (plenty of room for sandcastles, sun loungers and splashing in the shallows) and duo of swimming pools. Handily, the onsite restaurant also has a menu packed with family-friendly favourites – pizzas, pastas, burgers, classic salads – and a drinks list likely to appeal to adults (all the better for sipping while assuming the horizontal position on a lounger).Dhs150 (fully redeemable), Mon-Fri, Dhs175 (fully redeemable), Sat-Sun.Mon-Sun, 7am-10pm (pool), 7am-6pm (beach). Building 8, The Shoreline, Palm Jumeirah, riva-beach.com (04 430 9466).
sources.shortName: Best beaches in Dubai: 30 of the best revealed

sources.snippet: A tranquil oasis with a Mediterranean flair, Riva Beach Club is the perfect escape from the city's hustle. Its laid-back ambience, combined with top-notch amenities, makes it a favourite among both locals and tourists. Lounge on the private beach, dip in the temperature-controlled pool or indulge in Mediterranean cuisine.
sources.shortName: Top 15 Beaches In Dubai For A Perfect Getaway You Must Visit

sources.snippet: With kayaks, watersports and a chilled outdoor restaurant, this Palm Jumeirah beach club is all things relaxed. Guests grab cocktails from the palm-frond gazebo while families splash in the temperature-controlled pool. The beach here is calm and the waters flat, making it great for stand-up paddleboarding.
sources.shortName: 11 of the best beach spots you need to try in Dubai

sources.snippet: Riva Beach Club adds a new dimension to Dubai’s beach scene by being the city’s first stand-alone beachside destination. Located on Palm Jumeirah’s shoreline, Riva Beach Club is a restaurant and beach in one. It’s a relaxed but vibrant nook, suited to any occasion.
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai in 2024

places.name: Riva Beach Club

reviews.text: Riva Beach Club is an absolute gem for anyone looking to unwind by the water with a blend of luxury and comfort. From the moment you step in, you're greeted with a relaxing atmosphere and stunning views of the Dubai Palm. The beach is well-maintained, offering a peaceful escape from the city's hustle and bustle.

Verily nice pool with very good restaurant and bar. Have a nice after work drink or on the weekend with kids. It's very place to chill. Super friendly staff. Super Kids friendly.
Enjoy the pool or have a swim in the sea. Coming here many times. Specially in the summer is perfect as the pool is in shadow.
Their food is always nice. Tried today their taco Friday special and loved it will definitely be back next Friday for it.
Also it's one of the Rare places
You can have your food with your dog
On the terrace. Plus points for that too.
Big screens to watch football.
Enjoy the entre fee in redeemable on food and drinks.
Thanks again to their staff who makes us always very welcome and for today recommending the tacos was a winner. Well done to the kitchen team as well.

Everything at Riva was nice. The staff were attentive and very polite, always with a smile. I spent enjoyable days at this place. Just remember, if you use Google Maps to navigate your way, it is a bit inaccurate.  Find Building 8, and take a right just after the building, and you'll get to the club through the autopark if you drive.

places.generalDescription: Nikki Beach Dubai, situated in Jumeirah, is a part of the Nikki Beach & Spa and offers an unparalleled beach experience with luxurious day beds, delectable cuisine, and lively beach parties. Visitors can also engage in water sports like windsurfing and canoeing. Additionally, guests can indulge in the resort's spa services or stay in one of the beautiful ocean villa rooms.

sources.snippet: The fashionable Nikki Beach Dubai is a pleasure pit on the emerging Pearl Jumeirah residential peninsula. Here, the bronzed, beautiful and wealthy descend on this Dubai branch of the famous Miami beach club to frolic in the vast pool, lounge on daybeds, load up on seafood and toast the sunset with a glass of bubbly. Family-friendly Al Mamzar Beach Park in Dubai has playgrounds, snack bars and a swimming pool © Maremagnum / Getty Images
sources.shortName: Best beaches in Dubai

sources.snippet: Visit Nikki Beach, located at Jumeirah, to enjoy the Arabian Gulf’s blue waters and stunning panoramic view. Located as a part of Nikki Beach & Spa, the first club of Dubai, this spread of golden gravel will offer you an incomparable beach experience with options of luxurious day beds, mouthwatering cuisine meals and fun-filled beach parties. If you are out for some adventures, indulge in water sports such as canoeing, windsurfing etc.Highlights: Rent a daybed in the location of your choice, try out some delicious delicacies, attend one of the fun-filled beach parties, Enjoy water sports such as windsurfing, canoeing etc., luxuriate in the resort’s spa, stay at one of the beautiful ocean villa rooms, or enjoy a swim in the blue waters.Location: Waterfront, Pearl JumeirahYou may also like:  Best Things to Do in Dubai in Summer Best Water Parks in Dubai
sources.shortName: 20 Best Beaches in Dubai For A Sun-Kissed Getaway

sources.snippet: Nikki Beach is one of the first beach clubs in Dubai from where magnificent vistas can be enjoyed apart of thrilling activities. People who love luxurious beach experience will love this luxurious beach club that offers amazing beach parties, adventures, and lavish meals. There are ocean villa rooms available for rent on the beach that can be rented to enjoy a luxurious stay and amazing views from the windows.
sources.shortName: Best 18 Beaches In Dubai That Will Bring You Close To Nature

sources.snippet: Plush white sun beds, faded wood accents and and tribal decorations create this adults-only beach club on Dubai’s Pearl Jumeirah. Guests order plates of grilled cauliflower and blackened salmon tacos, then head to the four-tier shisha terrace. Thursdays there’s a deluxe pool party with a resident DJ, while Tuesday offers a special ladies daytime drinking package with sun bed.
sources.shortName: 11 of the best beach spots you need to try in Dubai

sources.snippet: Picture yourself relaxing on the pristine sands, enjoying a tropical cocktail, and listening to the latest beats from renowned international DJs. This is where the elite come to play and soak up the sun in style. Located at the Pearl Jumeira, it's a world-renowned brand that offers a unique blend of music, dining, and entertainment.
sources.shortName: Top 15 Beaches In Dubai For A Perfect Getaway You Must Visit

sources.snippet: Get the royal service you always wanted at Nikki Beach, among the best of Dubai’s beach hotels. It’s an absolutely charming resort with a gorgeous private beach. There is no way you will not fall in love with the place.
sources.shortName: Best Beaches in Dubai - Top 12 Dubai Beaches to discover

places.name: Nikki Beach Dubai (Beach Club & Restaurant)

reviews.text: A nice place ❤️ we were together with the girls, we really liked it. The food was delicious, beer with lime😋 There was a show program, and they pulled us out to dance. In addition to the pool, there is also a beach with the most beautiful view🌊🌊🌊

Our Experience at Nikki Beach Dubai – A Touch of Luxury with Minor Imperfections

Today, my wife and I spent the day at Nikki Beach Dubai, and overall, we were very impressed. As regular visitors to Dubai and frequent guests at many of the city's high-end beach clubs – from The Beach by FIVE to White Beach and Cove – we've developed a good sense for quality, service, and atmosphere. Nikki Beach certainly delivered on most fronts.

The ambience was elegant and refined. The venue is beautifully designed, clean, and well-maintained. The sunbeds were comfortable, the crowd was classy, and the staff was mostly attentive and courteous throughout our visit.

One of the standout highlights was definitely the food. Every dish we ordered was fresh, beautifully presented, and packed with flavor. We were genuinely impressed by the creativity of the kitchen and the attention to detail in taste and plating. The drinks were also well crafted and stylishly served.

However, there were two minor details that slightly affected our overall impression:
1.	The pool temperature was quite cold, which made swimming less enjoyable than expected. While this might not bother everyone, we would have preferred a slightly warmer pool given Dubai's otherwise perfect outdoor conditions.
2.	Surprisingly, no bread or butter (or even olive oil) was served at the beginning of the meal – a small gesture that we've come to expect in almost every upscale beach club in Dubai. It's not a major issue, of course, but when you're used to a certain standard of hospitality, such details stand out.

On the positive side, the music was great – not too loud, tasteful, and in tune with the relaxed, upscale vibe of the venue. It created a pleasant background without overpowering the atmosphere.

Despite those two minor points, we had a wonderful day and will definitely return. Nikki Beach Dubai is a sophisticated spot that combines style, great food, and a relaxed yet luxurious vibe. We can highly recommend it to anyone looking for a quality beach club experience in Dubai.

Excellent service Alex Management superb really did a good job to celebrate birthday. Staff is trying to be efficient quick and clean. Excellent vibe music good entertainment great location to enjoy the beach.

sources.snippet: Sunrise Beach, now known as the “new secret beach,” has taken the title once held by the former “secret beach” at Al Sufouh, which is now closed. This small yet beloved spot is popular for hosting birthday celebrations and special events. The beach offers breathtaking views of the skyline, with the iconic Burj Khalifa in sight, making it an ideal location for both sunrise photography and relaxation.
